narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: United Medical Imaging Healthcare, Inc. is a Clinic/Center, Radiology provider based in Los Angeles, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $106.9M in Medicaid payments across 213K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $106.9M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 13,356 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
